insert into t_order (member_id,orderDate,orderType,orderStatus,setmeal_id) values (#{memberId},#{orderDate},#{orderType},#{orderStatus},#{setmealId})
mapper.select: select m.name as member,s.name as setmeal,o.orderDate as orderDate,o.orderType as orderType from t_order o left join t_member m on o.member_id=m.id left join t_setmeal s on o.setmeal_id=s.id where o.id=#{id}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'

select s.name, count(o.id) setmeal_count ,count(o.id)/(select count(id) from t_order) proportion from t_order o inner join t_setmeal s on s.id = o.setmeal_id group by o.setmeal_id order by setmeal_count desc limit 0,3
